filter QVAlues and NA's and factor information

Source: R/tidyMS_R6_workflowFunctions.R
workflow_DIA_NA_preprocessing.Rd

filter QVAlues and NA's and factor information

workflow_DIA_NA_preprocessing(
  pdata,
  config,
  percent = 60,
  hierarchy_level = 2,
  factor_level = 1,
  min_peptides_protein = config$parameter$min_peptides_protein
)

Arguments

pdata

data.frame
config

AnalysisConfiguration
minCorrelation

correlation threshold default 0.7

See also

Other workflows: INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, workflow_corr_filter_impute(), workflow_correlation_preprocessing_protein_intensities()

Other deprecated: INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, compute_roc(), intensity_summary_by_hkeys(), medpolish_protein_quants(), workflow_correlation_preprocessing_protein_intensities()

Examples


library(prolfqua)
library(tidyverse)
rm(list=ls())
bb <- prolfqua::ionstar$filtered()

#> Column added : nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id
stopifnot(nrow(bb$data) == 25780)
config <- bb$config$clone(deep=TRUE)
data <- bb$data
data$nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id <- NULL

hierarchy_counts(data, config)

#> # A tibble: 1 x 3
#>   isotope protein_Id peptide_Id
#> * <chr>        <int>      <int>
#> 1 light          163       1258
tmp <- workflow_DIA_NA_preprocessing(data, config)

#> Columns added : srm_QValueMin, srm_QValueNR
#> completing cases
#> Joining, by = c("protein_Id", "peptide_Id")
#> Joining, by = "protein_Id"
#> completing cases
hierarchy_counts(tmp$data, config)

#> # A tibble: 1 x 3
#>   isotope protein_Id peptide_Id
#> * <chr>        <int>      <int>
#> 1 light          137        978
tmp <- workflow_DIA_NA_preprocessing(data, config, percent=70)

#> Columns added : srm_QValueMin, srm_QValueNR
#> completing cases
#> Joining, by = c("protein_Id", "peptide_Id")
#> Joining, by = "protein_Id"
#> completing cases
hierarchy_counts(tmp$data, config)

#> # A tibble: 1 x 3
#>   isotope protein_Id peptide_Id
#> * <chr>        <int>      <int>
#> 1 light          137        978
stopifnot(FALSE==(is.grouped_df(tmp$data)))
